name: The Last Smashing Park
description:
Hey guys, we present to you an humble and not finished game.

To participate to the mashup jam, we made a game combining mainly 2 movies : 

  • Jurassic park : don't be afraid if you see dinosaurs, they are made of pixels.
  • Last Action Hero : since you don't have a magic remote, the danger is weak.

Participants : 

  • Headax : lead, code and art
  • Ehausman : code and design
  • Max : code, design and 
  • Japan guy : visual art
  • TwinkleNoodleAudio : sound design
